Title: Metro Event To Command
Description: Metro Event To Command is a replacement for EventToCommand behavior for Windows RT.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Metro Event To Command is a replacement for EventToCommand behavior for Windows RT.




Ideal for MVVM pattern, it allows you to bind viewmodel commands to view controls events.

New in V2.1 :
  • HandleEvent property added. If True, event will be marked as "Handled" (Providing the event arg class permits it)

New in V2 :
  • Works with Windows Phone 8
  • Can pass event args to command
  • Memory leak fixed

Works with any command class deriving from ICommand, such as MVVMLight RelayCommand and RelayCommand<T>

Nuget package is here : MetroEventToCommand

Some docs and examples here : MetroEventToCommand V2.0 out

Enjoy !
